General_Description: '''Love Letter Blood Letter''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]] in 2018.
Section_Description: Kassandra answered the call of an [[Athenian military|Athenian soldier]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What does [[Athens]] need done today, soldier?''
*'''Soldier:''' ''There is a girl I love,'' [[Mercenary|misthios]]''. I think if I had stayed home, she would love me, too. But now I am posted here, and I hear there is a poet whispering his clever words in her ear.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Send her your own love letter, then.''
*'''Soldier:''' ''Oh. Do you think that would work? I was just going to have the poet killed.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And let me guess, you want me to kill him.''
*'''Soldier:''' ''By the [[Greek mythology|gods]], you read my mind.''
<tabber>
|-|I'll handle it.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. I'll do it.''
*'''Soldier:''' ''I'm glad to have someone of your strength on my side.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.''
|-|I'm not interested.=
Kassandra left, but reconsidered her decision and returned to speak with him again.
</tabber>
Kassandra left, [[Assassination|assassinated]] the writer, and came back after finishing her job.
*'''Soldier:''' ''You again. Have you killed him?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Your man is dead.''
*'''Soldier:''' ''I knew you were the type to get the job done. Here, take this as a sign of my gratitude.''
He gave her a bag of [[drachma]]e.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to help.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra attended to the soldier's request.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
